the keys
to the universe

item.title: Ship
item.description:
when you’re getting tossed
to and fro
you hold on
to whatever you can find

item.title: Prayer
item.description:
God give me a church that is faithful
to the faithless
a church that is kind
to the angry

item.title: Lost
item.description:
See, if God had ten people
and then, lost one of them
dropped behind a couch, or somewhere

item.title: Birth
item.description:
Adam's hair
is clean
Eve is
suitably bedraggled
created as she was
from the man's rib,

item.title: Untitled
item.description:
The church made a hole for itself in my heart
and told me that’s where I’d find God
and, often I did

item.title: Kingdoms
item.description:
Jesus wants me for a petty tyrant
to rule and reign
in Israel's house

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Wonder
item.description:
As a child I felt God as a warmth
A love, a comfort

That bearded man of blazing white
who helped me feel so safe at night
has failed to expand
with my expanding

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Holy places
item.description:
Stand in holy places, they say
and be not moved.
These places, not those places
you know the ones I mean.

1 minute read

you know the ones I mean.

item.author: "Jared Forsyth"

item.title: Rock and Tree
item.description:
The wise man built his house upon a rock
with jack-hammers and hammer-drills
poured concrete and steel i-beams
a surer foundation you’ve never seen
